thread.title: Karrueche Tran Claims Chris Brown Abused Her During Their Relationship
thread.title_full: Karrueche Tran Claims Chris Brown Abused Her During Their Relationship

author: Celebuzz
title: Karrueche Tran Claims Chris Brown Abused Her During Their Relationship
text:
Earlier this year, Brown threatened to beat up Soulja Boy when he saw that the rapper had liked an Instagram photo of Tran . Previously, Brown also accused his former girlfriend of being a THOT (“that hoe over there”) and physically forced himself into her car when the two crossed paths at a Los Angeles nightclub. 
Tran felt unsafe after Brown shared a video of him vowing to stalk his exes this month, in which he said, “Ladies, y’all be complaining about n***as being, like, stalkers and in love with y’all, kinda crazy and sh*t and you get tired of them. Well, guess what? I’m one of them n***as! If I love you, bitch, ain’t nobody gonna have you. I’m gonna make you miserable. I’m gonna chase that n***a out. I’m gonna chase your ass around.” 
Tran’s domestic violence restraining order requires Brown to stay 100 yards away from her and her family members.
